name: Idle Animals!
description:
Have you ever wondered how the animals body works?

In Idle Animals we give you the unique chance to discover and create the various parts of a different animals right from the first cell!

FROM CELLS TO ORGANISM
Discover the amazing sequence in which animals body unravels, starting from the very first bones to every organs leading to the nerves and muscles then, finally, a complete animal body!

Generate cells for:
- Skeleton
- Organs
- Nervous System
- Muscles
- Skin
- Fur
and bunch more.

You will have fun and learn about animal anatomy.

Game Features:
1. Easy and addictive to play
2. A lot of animals to discover
3. Stunning animal designs
4. Play wherever and whenever you want!
